title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 10-B
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 10-B
State Regulations
(cf. Part 458)
(Name of Municipality or Cooperative)
CERTIFICATE OF COMPLIANCE
Expansion of Existing Electric Service for the Purpose of

Conversion to

Electric Heat

The undersigned certifies that the
[ ] Existing Dwelling(s) [ ] Mobile Home(s)
[ ] Existing Commercial Structure(s)
at ____________ (Location)
is (are) or will be in compliance with the "Minimum Insulation
and Heating System Standards" prescribed by the Power Authority of the State of

New York and which are incorporated in the service rules of (name of
municipality or cooperative), not later than 30 days after completion of
expansion of existing electric service for the purpose of providing electric
heat. It is understood that electric service will not be connected or
will be disconnected if, upon inspection, the structure is found not to be in
compliance with the conditions set forth. The undersigned certifies that a properly executed copy of this
certificate will be delivered to the owner on completion of the electric work; and agrees that any successor in title to the owner shall be deemed a
beneficiary of the undertakings described in this certificate. Dated: ____________
______________
Signature of Builder or Contractor

Dated: ____________
______________
Signature of Representative of

Municipal Electric Department, Building

Code Enforcement Inspector or

Qualified Representative of the Municipal

Government

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app
10-B
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
